extension.disclaimer: Die gebruik van hierdie byvoeging beteken dat jy ooreengekom met die diensvoorwaardes wat op geleë is https://legal.yahoo.com
إستخدامك لهذه اﻹضافه يعنى موافقتك على شروط الخدمه التى يمكن اﻹطلاع عليها من خلال https://legal.yahoo.com
Употребявайки добавката Вие се съгласявате с условията за ползване на услугата, които се намират на https://legal.yahoo.com
L'ús d'aquest complement implica que vostè ha acceptat els termes de servei ubicats a https://legal.yahoo.com
Používáním tohoto rozšíření schvalujete podmínky užívání umístěné na https://legal.yahoo.com
Brug af denne add-on betyder at du har accepteret betingelserne for brug som du finder på https://legal.yahoo.com
Die Benutzung der Erweiterung impliziert, dass Sie den Nutzungsbedingungen unter https://legal.yahoo.com zugestimmt haben
Χρήση αυτού του πρόσθετου συνεπάγεται την αποδοχή των Όρων Χρήσης της Υπηρεσίας (Terms of Service) οι οποίοι βρίσκονται στο https://legal.yahoo.com
Use of this add-on implies that you have agreed to the Terms of Service located at https://legal.yahoo.com
Use of this add-on implies that you have agreed to the Terms of Service located at https://legal.yahoo.com
Use of this add-on implies that you have agreed to the Terms of Service located at https://legal.yahoo.com
El uso de este add-on implica la aceptación de los Términos de Servicio recogidos en https://legal.yahoo.com
Selle lisa kasutamine tähendab nõustumist Kasutustingimustega aadressilt https://legal.yahoo.com
Tämän lisäosan käyttäminen tarkoittaa että hyväksyt käyttäehdot, jotka ovat osoitteessa https://legal.yahoo.com
Par l'utilisation de ce module, vous attestez accepter les Conditions Générales d'Utilisation disponibles sur https://legal.yahoo.com
L'utilisation de cet addiciel implique que vous avez accepté les conditions générales d'utilisation situées à https://legal.yahoo.com
Empregar este complemento implica que vostede acepta os termos do servizo localizados en https://legal.yahoo.com
מהשימוש בהרחבה זו משתמע כי הסכמת לתנאי השירות המפורטים ב-https://legal.yahoo.com
Korištenje ovog dodatka podrazumijeva da se slažete sa Pravilima korištenja koji se nalaze na: https://legal.yahoo.com
Ennek a kiegészínőnek a használatával elfogadja a Felhasználói Feltételeket amik megtalálhatóak a https://legal.yahoo.com oldalon
Notkun á þessarri viðbót gefur til kynna að þú hafir samþykkt skilmálana sem finna má á https://legal.yahoo.com
L'uso di questo Add-on implica l'accettazione delle Condizioni di Servizio che trovi su https://legal.yahoo.com
このアドオンを使うことにより、https://legal.yahoo.com にある利用規約に同意したとみなされます。
이 애드온을 사용하는 것은 https://legal.yahoo.com 에 있는 서비스 이용 약관에 동의함을 의미합니다.
Naudodami šį priedą, jūs sutinkate su paslaugos sąlygomis, esančiomis https://legal.yahoo.com
Lietojot šo spraudni nozīmē, ka jūs esat piekrituši pakalpojumu sniegšanas noteikumiem, kas atrodas https://legal.yahoo.com
Het gebruik van deze add-on impliceert dat je akkoord gaat met de service-voorwaarden op https://legal.yahoo.com
Bruken av dette tillegget betinger at du har godkjent brukervilkårene på https://legal.yahoo.com
Korzystanie z tego dodatku jest równoznaczne z akceptacją regulaminu dostępnego pod adresem: https://legal.yahoo.com
O uso deste add-on implica o seu acordo com os Termos de Serviço disponíveis em https://legal.yahoo.com
O uso deste complemento implica em aceitar os Termos de Serviço localizado em https://legal.yahoo.com
Используя это дополнение, вы соглашаетесь с условиями предоставления услуг, доступными по адресу: https://legal.yahoo.com
Používaním tohto doplnku súhlasíte s podmienkami používania služby umiestnenými na https://legal.yahoo.com
Uporaba tega dodatka pomeni, da ste se strinjali s pogoji storitve, ki se nahajajo na https://legal.yahoo.com
Употреба овог додатка подразумева да сте сагласни са Условима Коришћења који се налазе на https://legal.yahoo.com
Användning av detta tillägg innebär att du har accepterat användarvillkoren som hittas på https://legal.yahoo.com
Bu eklentinin kullanımı aynı zamanda https://legal.yahoo.com adresindeki Kullanım Koşullarını da kabul ettiğiniz anlamına gelir.
Скориставшись цією надбудовою, ви тим самим погоджуєтеся з умовами використання: https://legal.yahoo.com
使用此插件表示你已同意此服务条款：https://legal.yahoo.com
extension.news:
[B]5.3.5[/B] (2024-05-16)
Minor improvements to addon.xml and changelog
[B]5.3.4[/B] (2024-04-21)
Fixed connection yet again (thx @ronie)
[B]5.3.3[/B] (2023-10-25)
Fixed connection yet again (thx @ronie)
[B]5.3.2[/B] (2023-03-27)
Fixed connection yet again (thx @ronie)
[B]5.3.1[/B] (2022-12-05)
Improved error handling (thx @ronie)
[B]5.3.0[/B] (2022-11-20)
- Changed addon to use hidden addon settings for cookie data instead of external "cookies.txt" file (thx @ronie) - Improved error handling with expanded automatic retry functionality
[B]5.2.9[/B]
Fixed connection yet again (cookie stuff, thx @ronie) (working @ 2022-11-19)
[B]5.2.8[/B]
Fixed connection yet again (cookie stuff, thx @ronie) (working @ 2022-07-19)
[B]5.2.7[/B]
Fixed connection yet again (cookie stuff) (working @ 2022-05-28)
[B]5.2.6[/B]
Fixed connection yet again (cookie stuff) (working @ 2022-03-29)
[B]5.2.5[/B] [B]5.2.4[/B]
Minor improvements
[B]5.2.3[/B]
Further improved cookie code
[B]5.2.2[/B]
Improved cookie fetching from v5.2.1
[B]5.2.1[/B]
Fixed connection (cookie stuff) (still working @ 2022-02-15)
[B]5.2.0[/B]
Fixed again (still working, 2021-06-24)
v5.1.0 - broken due to site changes
v5.0.7 - fix crash when precipitation data is missing
v5.0.6 - cleanup
v5.0.5 - fix url. thx olympus
v5.0.4 - fix hourly wind direction
v5.0.3 - cosmetics
v5.0.2 - fix crash when speed is set to Beaufort
v5.0.1 - fix crash when speed is set to Beaufort
v5.0.0 - new version, old api closed
v4.3.2 - move repo to gitlab
v4.3.1 - retry to fetch weather a few times
v4.3.0 - cache weather data
v4.2.4 - update translations
v4.2.3 - fix sunrise/sunset format
v4.2.2 - handle keys with value null
v4.2.1 - bugfix
v4.2.0 - add support for daily infolabels
v4.1.0 - update to new api
v4.0.1 - localize sunset/sunrise
v4.0.0 - remove simplejson support
v3.1.1 - remove unused code
v3.1.0 - change url due to api changes
v3.0.9 - add option for 5 locations
v3.0.8 - cosmetics - language update
v3.0.7 - updated language files from Transifex
v3.0.6 - fix another crash on empty values
v3.0.5 - fix potential crash on empty values
v3.0.4 - clear category properties
v3.0.3 - updated language files from Transifex
3.0.2 - deprecate xbmc.abortRequested
v3.0.1 - fix UnicodeDecodeError
v3.0.0 - kodi name change
v2.0.4 - language update
v2.0.3 - no reason
v2.0.2 - language update
v2.0.1 - language update
v2.0.0 - gotham release
v1.0.3 - add provider logo
v1.0.2 - fix bug in clear infolabels
v1.0.1 - initial release
